name: Chicken Noodle Soup
comments: If you have any large chicken or turkey bones, throw them in the pot for extra flavor.
ingredients: to taste: salt, pepper, poultry seasoning, garlic powder
instructions: Combine all ingredients except noodles in large pot. Heat to boiling and let cook 15-30 minutes, reducing heat halfway through. During last two minutes of cooking, add noodles. Remove bay leaf and serve.
